item.title: Windows下安装mysql
item.author: Author
item.description: 文档传送门(https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/windows-installation.html) 从noinstall ZIP Archive安装 初始化data目录 1 mysqld --initialize --console 登录, 输入随机生成的密码 1 mysql -u root -p 修改密码 1 ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'your-password';
